name: Toys & Run
description:
This was our first Jam inside Evolis 3D with a 5 student team made in 3 and a half days.

the game consist on trying to survive as long as possible racing around the track, the subject of this Jam was (Toy shop) so we decided to do a little set of props as the course and decorate it with toys.

The team contacts + artstations:

sergiblanch.artstation.com

darsirious.artstation.com

paucreix.artstation.com

instagram: bertus28

facebook: Anna Mercedes

facebook and instagram: Ana Mercedes Ortega Caicedo

controls:

(W,A,S,D)

space to jump

R to Reset

the game is VERY BUGGY in terms of collisions and the car flipping so have the restart key on close by.
